## MediaControl.getElement() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use [MediaControl.putElement()](./player.mediacontrol.putelement.md) instead
> 

Get a media control element DOM node

**Signature:**

```typescript
getElement(name: MediaControlElement): ZeptoResult | null;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

name


</td><td>

[MediaControlElement](./player.mediacontrolelement.md)


</td><td>

The name of the media control element


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[ZeptoResult](./player.zeptoresult.md) \| null

The DOM node to render to or extend

## Remarks

Use this method to render custom media control UI in a plugin

## Example


```ts
class MyPlugin extends UICorePlugin {
  override render() {
    const mediaControl = this.core.getPlugin('media_control')
    const clipText = mediaControl.getElement('clipText')
    clipText?.el.text('Here we go')
    return this
  }
}
```
